member.name: DEVICE_DATA_SET_LB_PROVISIONING_STATE
member.summary: Output structure for the DeviceDsmAction_Allocation action of theIOCTL_STORAGE_MANAGE_DATA_SET_ATTRIBUTEScontrol code.

member.name: DEVICE_DATA_SET_LB_PROVISIONING_STATE.Size
member.summary: The size of this structure, including the bitmap, in bytes.

member.name: DEVICE_DATA_SET_LB_PROVISIONING_STATE.SlabSizeInBytes
member.summary: The size of a slab, in bytes.

member.name: DEVICE_DATA_SET_LB_PROVISIONING_STATE.SlabOffsetDeltaInBytes
member.summary: If the range specified is not aligned to the OptimalUnmapGranularity as returned in structure then the data represented in the SlabAllocationBitMap is offset from the specified range by this amount.

member.name: DEVICE_DATA_SET_LB_PROVISIONING_STATE.SlabAllocationBitMapBitCount
member.summary: The number of relevant bits in the bitmap.

member.name: DEVICE_DATA_SET_LB_PROVISIONING_STATE.SlabAllocationBitMapLength
member.summary: The number of DWORDs in the bitmap array.

member.name: DEVICE_DATA_SET_LB_PROVISIONING_STATE.SlabAllocationBitMap
member.summary: The allocation bitmap containing one bit for each slab. If a bit is set then the corresponding slab is allocated. Otherwise, if a bit is clear, the corresponding slab is unallocated.
